thread.section_title: Hotel Pavillon Bastille - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pleasant stay
thread.title_full: Pleasant stay - Review of Hotel Pavillon Bastille, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tomR2465OW
title: Pleasant stay
text:
Good hotel, good value for money, friendly and helpful staff, clean, good accessibility (17 min by tube from gare du Nord)
I went on a business trip so the location was the most important element for the selection. However the neighbourhood around Bastille does not offer much recreation (restaurants, bars etc)
